name: Doreply
tagline: Let's get rid of noreply emails and communicate like human beings again
body:
# Do reply 
Let's take the chance to engage with fellow human beings instead of sounding like a horrible machine gone awry. Next time you receive an email from noreply@someorginization.com or if someone is asking you to setup a noreply email account send them to this website.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
